# Set up simulation parameters
```{r}
runs = 1000
n_s = c(20, 30,40,50,60,70,80,90,100,200,300,400, 500, 1000)
n0 = 5

SuccessProbs_known = c(0.45, 0.6)

SuccessProbs = matrix(data = c(0.3, 0.1, 0.4, 0.8), nrow = 2, ncol = 2)

c_gamma = 3

Model_allocations = c("Neyman", "RSIHR", "Rosenberger", "OptimallyAdjusted")
Model_estimations = c("Known", "Estimated", "DBCD")
```


```{r}

runSims = function(k, n, n0, Z, T, Results, SuccessProbs_known, c_gamma) {
  
  df = data.frame(
    Model = character(),
    Run = integer(),
    Successes_total = integer(),
    Successes_A = integer(),
    Successes_B = integer(),
    Allocated_A = integer(),
    Allocated_B = integer(),
    Power = double()
  )

  # Results
  T = length(SuccessProbs)/2
  Results = matrix(0, nrow = n, ncol = T)
  Z = rbinom(n,1,0.5) # Simulate single binary covariate

  
RunModel <- function(AllocationMethod, EstimationMethod, n, n0, Results, k, p_known, gam = NULL){
  Allocation = ResponseAdaptive(n, n0, Results, AllocationMethod = AllocationMethod, EstimationMethod = EstimationMethod, p_known =  p_known, gam = gam)
  TotalSuccesses = successCount(Allocation, Results)
  TotalTreatmentSuccesses = successTreatmentCount(Allocation, Results)
  
  df_update = c(paste("RA", EstimationMethod, AllocationMethod, sep = "_"),
                k,
                TotalSuccesses,
                TotalTreatmentSuccesses[1],
                TotalTreatmentSuccesses[2],
                sum(Allocation == 1),
                sum(Allocation == 2),
                PowerCalc(p_known, Allocation, alpha = 0.05, alternative = "two.sided")
                )
  return(data.frame(t(df_update)))
}
  
  
  
    for (i in 1:T) {
      Results[ , i] = rbinom(n, 1, SuccessProbs[Z+1, i]) 
    }

# Run random model
  df[nrow(df)+1,] = RunModel(AllocationMethod = "Random", EstimationMethod = NULL, n, n0, Results, k, SuccessProbs_known)
 
  
# Run remaining models
  for (AM in Model_allocations) {
    for (EM in Model_estimations) {
      df[nrow(df)+1,] = RunModel(AllocationMethod = AM, EstimationMethod = EM, n, n0, Results, k, SuccessProbs_known, gam = c_gamma)
    }
    
  }
 return(df)
}


```


```{r}
numCores <- parallel::detectCores() # Requires library(parallel)
cl = makeCluster(numCores)
registerDoParallel(cl)
print(numCores)
```




```{r}
start_time <- Sys.time()
resultsCombined = foreach(k = 1:runs, .combine = rbind) %dopar% {
  res = c()
  for (n in n_s) {
    res = rbind(res, runSims(k, n, n0, Z, T, Results, SuccessProbs_known, c_gamma))
  }
  return(res)
}

end_time <- Sys.time()

end_time - start_time
```

```{r}
stopCluster(cl)
```

```{r}
write.csv(resultsCombined, file = paste("./V2_Results/Scenario_1_RA_",format(Sys.time(), "%Y%m%d"),".csv", sep = ""))
```
